column1: Uchi////A faithful reiteration of its original in Austin
column2: Uchi Houston is a premium restaurant destination serving inspired Japanese-style small plates with consistency and the popularity to match. This was my second visit to this location
column3: and significantly better than my first. Neither a traditional Japanese sushi restaurant nor an Asian fusion concept that takes it too far
column4: Uchi manages to serve dishes that respect the concept of authenticity while also pushing the boundaries of Japanese cuisine. Everyone says this
column5: and its for good reason: make sure to come during happy hour!
